txt.en: North in the hills beyond Umbar Baharbêl, you will find bog-lurkers nesting in the fields as you approach the shore. Hunt the bog-lurkers for their legs and seeds.
North in the hills beyond Umbar Baharbêl, you will find bog-lurkers nesting in the fields as you approach the shore. Hunt the bog-lurkers for their legs and seeds.

'Travel north beyond the city to where the hills and shore meet. You will find a nest of bog-lurkers there. You may also find some that wandered away from the nest. Hunt them for their legs and the seeds on their backs.'
Deliver the seeds and legs to Luthana at the hunter's expedition
Deliver the seeds and legs to Luthana at the hunter's expedition

'Travel north beyond the city to where the hills and shore meet. You will find a nest of bog-lurkers there. You may also find some that wandered away from the nest. Hunt them for their legs and the seeds on their backs.'

Luthana requested that you make your way north to the hills that stretch to the shore. She suggested that there is an area there where bog-lurkers nest. She asked that you collect the legs and the seeds from their backs.

'There is a nest of bog-lurkers north beyond the city. I cannot say that the lurkers are a menace, only that the cooks of Umbar prize the seeds you can pluck from their backs. Their legs, too, are a delicacy enjoyed widely in the city.\n\n'Because of these facts, they become the target of hunters. You will be paid if you join in this hunt.'
Deliver the seeds and legs to Luthana at the expedition camp

'Do not fret for the lurkers. They will recover. We have long hunted them and used them as a food source. We are careful not to reduce their population too far. We strike a balance with them and allow them to recover.'
A Collection of Seeds and Legs
